message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SY, cs.CY, cs.AI, cs.LG

The paper deals with privacy risks in large-scale sensing and actuation infrastructures, which is a topic closely related to computer security (cs.CR). The paper also presents a framework for modeling the trade-off between control performance and privacy risks, which involves system control (cs.SY) and optimization (cs.CY) techniques. The authors use mutual information as a privacy metric, which is a concept from information theory and machine learning (cs.AI). Finally, the paper evaluates the proposed framework using real-world occupancy data, which involves data analysis and machine learning techniques (cs.LG).
